description:
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to lead interdepartmental and departmental business process transformation activities and engage with key stakeholders and clients in the advancement of technologies and analytics. DND must lead financial process improvements to revitalize and support innovation in the financial management processes, tools and systems similar to those currently used by the department. This will require providing advice and guidance to the Director, Financial Systems Integration (DFSI), to the Director General, Strategic Financial Governance (DGSFG), to the Governance and Project Management Office team (G&PMO) within DFSI, as well as clients and stakeholders across the DND/CAF.

",
full_summary:
Government of Canada | Notice of Proposed Procurement | Project Manager (Senior)
==============================================

**Reference Number**
------------------

*TSPS-DFSIPM-Senior (cb-890-76019927)*

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------

***Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
***Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
***Notice Posting Date:** 2024-01-05
***Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-23T14:00:00*
***Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-03-11
***Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31*

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a Project Manager (Senior) to lead interdepartmental and departmental business process transformation activities. The successful candidate will be expected to engage with key stakeholders and clients to advance technologies and analytics, and provide advice and guidance to senior management and the Governance and Project Management Office team.

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead financial process improvements to revitalize and support innovation in the financial management processes, tools, and systems
* Provide advice and guidance to the Director, Financial Systems Integration, the Director General, Strategic Financial Governance, and the Governance and Project Management Office team
* Engage with key stakeholders and clients to advance technologies and analytics

**Services to be Provided:**
The DND seeks to enter into a non-discretionary service agreement for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) for a period of one (1) project. The project objective is to lead financial process improvements and support innovation in the financial management processes, tools, and systems.

**Procurement Information:**
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others
* **Location:** Ottawa, ON, Canada
* **Contact:** Caleb Wallace, ADM Financial Procurement, (000) 000-0000, ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca

**Proposal Submissions:**
* Proposals must be submitted electronically via Canada Buys (canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Proposal submission deadline: 2024-01-23T14:00:00

**Additional Documents:**
* RFP document: [link to Canada Buys website]
* Attachment: https://canadabu
